Procedure.name: setupCCB
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=CCB servoSetup=CCB receiversSetup=CCB initialize=CCB device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupKKG
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=KKG servoSetup=KKG receiversSetup=KKG receiversMode=SINGLEDISH initialize=KKG device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupLLP
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=LLP receiversSetup=LLP receiversMode=XXC4 initialize=LLP device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupPPP
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=PPP receiversSetup=PPP receiversMode=C3XX initialize=PPP device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: setupPLP
Procedure.body: antennaReset antennaSetup=LP servoSetup=PLP receiversSetup=PLP receiversMode=C3C4 initialize=PLP device=0 calOff

Procedure.name: telescopePark
Procedure.body: antennaReset goTo=180d,89.8d receiversPark waitOnSource servoPark antennaPark asOff asPark
